description:
Creating your own personalised Mini’s is a great part of the Warhammer hobby, and today Jake is making three models inspired by classes found in Space Marine 2 and has loads of fun along the way.

Kits used:
Heavy-
Space Marine Primaris Eradicators
Salamanders Primaris Upgrades and Transfers

Assault-
Captain with Jump Pack
Black Templars Sword Brethren
Space Marines: Lieutenant

Vanguard-
Captain in Phobos Armour
Primaris Lieutenant in Reiver Armour
Black Templars Sword Brethren
Space Marines: Lieutenant
Primaris Reivers

If you're new to painting, our Citadel Colour Painting Essentials playlist hosts an array of beginner-friendly videos to help you get started.

Follow for more Warhammer, more often:

- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/warhammerofficial/
- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/WarhammerOfficial/
- X: https://x.com/warhammer
- Warhammer Community: https://www.warhammer-community.com/
- Get Warhammer in your inbox: https://ow.ly/6SJq50T3NL1
title: Turning our Space Marine 2 Characters into Minis! | Warhammer 40,000
